game.name: Nauts
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Nauts is a space action roguelike. Run and develop your civilization in a mysterious and dangerous universe. Knowledge will be your best tool: explore and discover what is hidden in to the Cosmos while surviving as many dangers that will appear on your journey.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Nauts is a space action roguelike. Run and develop your civilization in a mysterious and dangerous universe. Knowledge will be your best tool: explore and discover what is hidden in to the Cosmos while surviving as many dangers that will appear on your journey.
game.developers: Jorge A. García González, Carlos Álvarez-Nava González
